sentence.Network_en: I went through about four years of being addicted to video games.
sentence.Network_cn: 我大约有4年时间沉迷在电子游戏中。

sentence.Network_en: Many of the women are addicted to heroin and cocaine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些女人中很多人都吸食海洛因和可卡因成瘾了。

sentence.Network_en: After about three months, I was no longer addicted to nicotine.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约3个月后，我就不再对尼古丁上瘾了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from the obsolete adjective addict 'bound or devoted (to someone'), from Latin addict- 'assigned', from the verb addicere, from ad- 'to' + dicere 'say'

entry.def: Someone who is addicted to a harmful drug cannot stop taking it.

example.ex: Many of the women are addicted to heroin and cocaine...
example.tran: 这些女人中很多人都吸食海洛因和可卡因成瘾了。

example.ex: After about three months, I was no longer addicted to nicotine.
example.tran: 大约3个月后，我就不再对尼古丁上瘾了。

entry.def: If you say that someone is addicted to something, you mean that they like it very much and want to spend as much time doing it as possible.

example.ex: I went through about four years of being addicted to video games...
example.tran: 我大约有4年时间沉迷在电子游戏中。

example.ex: She had become addicted to golf.
example.tran: 她已经迷上高尔夫球了。

means.word_mean: 1. compulsively or physiologically dependent on something habit-forming;

auth_sentence.content: He was drinking heavily, and addicted to painkillers.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was drinking heavily, and addicted to painkillers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was drinking heavily, and addicted to painkillers.

auth_sentence.content: Not everyone who becomes addicted has the same experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not everyone who becomes addicted has the same experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not everyone who becomes addicted has the same experience.

Sentence.sentence: You can't be addicted to the environment.
Singers may become addicted to it.
Internet rescue camps in South Korea and China try to save kids addicted to the screen.

sentences.en: She's become addicted to love stories.

jushi.english: She says she's unable to give up smoking; she's completely addicted.
jushi.chinese: 她说她无法戒烟,已经完全上瘾了。

jushi.english: He was passionately addicted to pop music.
Some children become too addicted to chocolate.
jushi.chinese: 有些孩子太爱吃巧克力糖了。
